actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

official_title: A bill to require the posting online of certain government contracts.
short_title: Contractor Accountability and Transparency Act of 2016

summary.text:
Contractor Accountability and Transparency Act of 2016

This bill requires the head of each executive agency to post each covered contract (i.e., a contract for the procurement of property or services with a value greater than the simplified acquisition threshold) entered into by that agency on a publicly available website in a searchable format. The agency head may redact sensitive or classified information, trade secrets, or other proprietary information in such contracts.

titles.title: Contractor Accountability and Transparency Act of 2016
